Package interfaces

Interface CollisionElement

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplePickup, Entity, Pickup, RandomPoint, SnakeEntity
public interface CollisionElement

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean collidedWithBy​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox, CollisionElement source, java.awt.Rectangle infringedBoundary)
    Called by the CollisionController when the collisionBox has collided with this entity.
    boolean collidedWithGameBoundary​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox)
    Called by the CollisionController when the collisionBox is colliding with the boundary of the game
    java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
    Calculates the boundary of this entity
    java.awt.Rectangle isCollisionBoxIntersecting​(java.awt.Rectangle collision, CollisionElement source)
    Used to test if the collision box has collided with this entity

  • Method Details

    • collidedWithGameBoundary

      boolean collidedWithGameBoundary​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox)
      Called by the CollisionController when the collisionBox is colliding with the boundary of the game
      Parameters:
      collisionBox - The collision box intersecting the boundary
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision event is consumed, false otherwise

    • collidedWithBy

      boolean collidedWithBy​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox, CollisionElement source, java.awt.Rectangle infringedBoundary)
      Called by the CollisionController when the collisionBox has collided with this entity.
      Parameters:
      collisionBox - The collision box
      source - The source of the collision
      infringedBoundary - The boundary infringed by the collision
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision event is consumed, false otherwise

    • isCollisionBoxIntersecting

      java.awt.Rectangle isCollisionBoxIntersecting​(java.awt.Rectangle collision, CollisionElement source)
      Used to test if the collision box has collided with this entity
      Parameters:
      collision - The collision box to test against
      source - The source of the collision box
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision box is intersecting this entity, false otherwise

    • getBounds

      java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Calculates the boundary of this entity
      Returns:
      Returns the boundary
